name: ICQAdBlocker
short_description:
A little Windows-Software which contains commands to kick the internet connection of whoever you don't like ;-)
The actual commands are hidden behind a programm that is titled ICQAdBlocker to fool the person who opens it. The front-end is a standard windows-programm and in the backend there only exist some commands.

Unzip, Share it , but don't you dare opening it!
A restart or a command like ipconfig /renew should be enough to restore the connection.
summary: Fake programm to kick somebodys internet connection
